SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bishop
The Bishop class represents a bishop piece in the chess game.
Board
The Board class represents the chess board and manages the game logic.
CheckScanner
The CheckScanner class is responsible for scanning the chess board and determining if the king is in check.
ColorEnum
An enumeration of custom colors with associated hexadecimal or RGBA values.
InfoPanel
 
Input
The Input class handles mouse input events for the chess board.
King
The King class represents a king piece in the chess game.
Knight
The Knight class represents a knight piece in the chess game.
Main
The Main class represents the entry point of the chess game application.
Move
The Move class represents a move in the chess game.
Pawn
The Pawn class represents a pawn piece in the chess game.
Piece
The Piece class represents a general chess piece in the game.
Queen
The Queen class represents a queen piece in the chess game.
Rook
The Rook class represents a rook piece in the chess game.
